items.title: Create a Vision For Change That Truly Engages People!
items.headline: Learn about 3 ingredients to establish a motivating vision statement for change management in organizations
objectives_summary: Creating a compelling vision that makes employees and customers proud of the organization
Formulating a vision in such a way that it is actually motivating and makes people take responsibility.
Involving relevant stakeholders in vision development in order to bring the common interest to the surface.

items.title: Identifying and Tackling Major Issues At Your Company

items.headline: This course discusses 20 topics that BODs and CEOs should be addressed to help create your unique prioritization.
objectives_summary: Identify tactical steps to increase your effectiveness in tackling major issues at your company.
Recognize how to anticipate key questions your CEO and Board of Directors will ask before they are asked.
Discover how to communicate in the "What's in it for me (WIFM)” approach non-accountants are looking for.

items.title: Operations Management - Enterprise Resource Planning
items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of ERP Metrics
objectives_summary: In this course you will understand and analyse the key concepts in operations management, resource planning, application systems, operations management process tools and frameworks to improve core business processes

In this course you will learn to analyse and evaluate the role of enterprise resource planning as core to successful operations, and how operational practices contribute to the efficient operations in both service and manufacturing environments
In this course you will learn how to investigate and analyse the core business processes of an organization's internal and external supply chain interactions to create high-quality outcomes

items.title: Organizational Transformation Implementation Success
items.headline: How to avoid forming an “island effect” while implementing innovative strategies in a corporate structure
objectives_summary: Help executives and mid-level management recognize incompatibilities that are most likely to impact negatively the implementation strategy
Assist leading team in crafting a sustainable organizational structure beyond technology change management initiatives
Guide management team to strategically align with business objectives and deliver performance throughout the transition period

objectives_summary: Learn how to grow a following on the Clubhouse app, develop great collaborations, and convert listeners into customers.
